DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study to evaluate efficacy of Keppra (levetiracetam) for seizure control in patients with alcohol related seizures.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Keppra in Acute Alcohol Related Seizure Control--A Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: No trauma Not pregnant No other cause for seizure (hypoglycemia, CNS causes, trauma) Good family support Working telephone contact Pregnancy Renal failure (creatine > 2mg/dl Fever or illness Hypotension Any trauma
